title: Metaverse
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: metaverse-relationships
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20315
	- preferred-term:: Metaverse
	- status:: mature
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A convergent network of persistent, synchronous 3D virtual worlds, augmented reality environments, and internet platforms that enable shared spatial computing experiences with interoperable digital assets, persistent identity, and real-time social interaction.
	- source:: [[ISO 23257]], [[ETSI GR MEC 032]], [[IEEE P2048]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:Metaverse
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InfrastructureDomain]], [[VirtualSocietyDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: metaverse-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse Infrastructure]]
		- is-part-of:: [[Multiverse]]
		- has-part:: [[Synchronous Interaction]]
		- has-part:: [[User Identity System]]
		- has-part:: [[Virtual World]]
		- has-part:: [[Spatial Computing]]
		- has-part:: [[Virtual Economy]]
		- has-part:: [[Interoperability Protocol]]
		- has-part:: [[Avatar]]
		- has-part:: [[Digital Asset]]
		- has-part:: [[Persistent State]]
		- has-part:: [[Social System]]
		- requires:: [[Asset Management]]
		- requires:: [[Real-time Synchronization]]
		- requires:: [[Distributed Computing]]
		- requires:: [[Identity Management]]
		- requires:: [[Network Infrastructure]]
		- requires:: [[3D Rendering]]
		- requires:: [[Blockchain]]
		- enables:: [[Cross-World Portability]]
		- enables:: [[Immersive Entertainment]]
		- enables:: [[Creator Economy]]
		- enables:: [[Social VR]]
		- enables:: [[Virtual Commerce]]
		- enables:: [[Virtual Collaboration]]
		- enables:: [[Digital Ownership]]
		- depends-on:: [[Content Distribution Network]]
		- depends-on:: [[Game Engine]]
		- depends-on:: [[Database System]]
		- depends-on:: [[Cloud Computing]]
		- depends-on:: [[Extended Reality]]
		- depends-on:: [[Internet]]

ontology.definition: A convergent network of persistent, synchronous 3D virtual worlds, augmented reality environments, and internet platforms that enable shared spatial computing experiences with interoperable digital assets, persistent identity, and real-time social interaction.
